title: Straight White Men (with Zak Mucha)
itunes:title: Straight White Men (with Zak Mucha)
description: Jessa invites Zak Mucha, author of Emotional Abuse: A Manual For Self-Defense, onto Public Intellectual to discuss straight white men and the crisis of masculinity. They talk about masculine expectations, the nature and nurturing of masculinity in our society, the role of women in men’s lives, the relationship between class and masculinity, and more.
content:encoded: Jessa invites Zak Mucha, author of Emotional Abuse: A Manual For Self-Defense, onto Public Intellectual to discuss straight white men and the crisis of masculinity.
